fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
A Metamorph Killing will always spawn
Factional chat
No factional kill unless no Killing members are alive.
All original roles can swap roles with another player at night, with faction and goal staying the same. This will fail on Neutral roles with unique goals. Only one member may swap roles each night.
__The Metamorphs cannot win unless all members apart from one have a different role than they started with.__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Emerge with a new form and destroy all opposition.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Emerge with a new form and destroy all opposition.
